name: Ohr: אור
description: The people's cries have activated ancient Ohr deposits and woken you from your slumber. Now you must help them to find their frequencies, their souls ... your heaven.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: win 7 + (64 bit) Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB of dedicated video memory/ latest directxweb drivers (included) Additional Notes: Please make sure you have the latest DXWEB (included)
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews.review_text: yup! its another chapter of Barry in the feverland!  at first - some info i found:  Ohr  means ' Light ' in Hebrew (אור‎‎) or ' Divine influence ' and used in Kabalistic tradition as concept in which light is used as a way of describing divine attributes. Also it means ' ear ' or ' audio ' in German. and its not an accident.  in this 198x nes-styled game u'r playing as Princess (or Angel), traveling thru the strange world, enters destroyed post-apocalypse cities and tunnels in seraching of soul frequencies (!) so then u can bring 'em back to bereaved nps's after what they can Sing a Song and Praise  the Sun  You!  i don't finish the game yet 'couse its hardcore style as any of Dylan's game! trying and trying, searching new ways and stuff, shopping, failing again and again 'till u succeed.. as in real life! game is filled with melancholy, has sad atmosphere piano score by developer himself and noises from experimental musician F. Tyler, has a lots of mysticism and esoteric influences. i guess it reflects the mind of its creator and has deep thought base despite low budget production.  so I recommend to try this psychic journey to the depths of inner mind and outer divine presence. cheers and thx to developer for creating such psychdelic stuff.  p.s.:   cows is also present.
